General.Name: Sare Holding S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Sare Holding, S.A.B. de C.V. engages in the design, development, engineering, construction, promotion, and sale of residential houses in Mexico. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
